attachments.title: Ready For Retina HD: Create Pixel-Perfect Assets For Multiple Scale Factors - Smashing Magazine
attachments.text: The new Retina HD display will need 3x assets. Karsten Bruns shows how to generate multiple asset versions from a single vector shape in a Photoshop file.
attachments.fallback: Smashing Magazine: Ready For Retina HD: Create Pixel-Perfect Assets For Multiple Scale Factors - Smashing Magazine

text: a good read on one user's process for designing assets for the multiple iDevice resolutions.
